t: Amazon beats Apple and Google to become the world's most valuable brand
s: June 11, 2019 - Amazon has overtaken Google and Apple to become the world's most valuable brand at $315.5 billion, according to a ranking of global companies, up 52% on last year.

t: Amazon tops Apple, Google as world's most valuable brand, study says | Marketing Dive
s: June 14, 2019 - Kantar's BrandZ ranking is based on financial data and the opinions of about 4 million consumers in 51 countries worldwide. Amazon's rise to the world's most valuable brand reflects its expansion from the "everything store" into consumer technology, movie production and video streaming.

t: Amazon tops Apple and Google as world's most valuable corporate brand - CBS News
